messages.messageBody:
Hello all,

I have just added a wonderful article by Allan H. Pressley to my web site.
It is "The Koto Bingo Mihara School". Please take a look at the link
below.

http://www.nihontocraft.com/japanese_sword_articles.html

Best regards,
Danny Massey
www.nihontocraft.com
